scripts.test-with-report: npx playwright test generated/excel-generated-tests-clean.spec.ts --reporter=html --timeout=120000 --workers=1 && npx playwright show-report
scripts.test-headed-report: npx playwright test generated/excel-generated-tests-clean.spec.ts --headed --reporter=html --timeout=120000 --workers=1 && npx playwright show-report
scripts.generate-clean: npm run generate && npm run auto-cleanup
scripts.test-clean: npm run test && npm run auto-cleanup
scripts.build-clean: npm run build && npm run auto-cleanup
